title: Shopkeepers问题！
author: 栀栀太坏了
txt_content:
Shopkeepers插件的问题
举个栗子！
比如我用一个钻石，改了名，加了多行lore，用来交易另一个道具的，但是，玩家却可以使用普通钻石交易那个道具。但是书本材质的道具就不会呗这样，同时后台还有这样一段报错~


[14:09:18] [Server thread/ERROR]: Error occurred while enabling Shopkeepers v1.32 (Is it up to date?)
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.bukkit.Bukkit.getOnlinePlayers()Ljava/util/Collection;
        at com.nisovin.shopkeepers.ShopkeepersPlugin.onEnable(ShopkeepersPlugin.java:289) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:250) ~[spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:350) [spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:390) [spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.CraftServer.loadPlugin(CraftServer.java:460) [spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.CraftServer.enablePlugins(CraftServer.java:380) [spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.m(MinecraftServer.java:348) [spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.g(MinecraftServer.java:325) [spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:281) [spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:186) [spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:437) [spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:617) [spigot172.jar:git-Spigot-1.7.2-R0.3-122-gb58e277]
[14:09:18] [Server thread/INFO]: [Residence] Enabling Residence v2.6.6.6

replies.txt_content:
要选择适合的版本下载，不要省事只下载站内的。
bukkit 地址
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/shopkeepers/files

replies.author: 栀栀太坏了
replies.txt_content:
1879101822 发表于 2016-9-18 13:40
要选择适合的版本下载，不要省事只下载站内的。
bukkit 地址
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/shopke ...
我下载过- - 而且相关的插件转码啊什么的都做过

replies.author: 栀栀太坏了
replies.txt_content:
1879101822 发表于 2016-9-18 13:40
要选择适合的版本下载，不要省事只下载站内的。
bukkit 地址
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/shopke ...
期间做了什么我也不想叽里呱啦说一大堆 --
插件的配置里，肯定有关于自动更新的，设为false就可以了

replies.author: 栀栀太坏了
replies.txt_content:

插件的配置里，肯定有关于自动更新的，设为false就可以了
然并卵- -
